paragraphs.p1: In this corridor, the high-speed connection between Madrid and Zaragoza was opened in 2003, and it was not until 2008 that it reached Barcelona.
paragraphs.p2: The emissions from the construction of the high-speed line (estimated at around 8 million tons of CO2e), combined with operational emissions (considering the period from 2003 to 2019) and infrastructure maintenance, total 8.7 million tons of CO2e over the period.
paragraphs.p3: On the other hand, the air mode has emitted 5 million tons of CO2e, 97% of which occurred during the operational phase, in the period from 2003 to 2024.
paragraphs.p4: In this case, the cumulative emissions per air passenger (80 kg CO2e/pax) remain lower than those of rail passengers (88 kg CO2e/pax).
